channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Anchorage Digital opens up DeFi voting for custody clients
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Anchorage joins AAVE, Lido and BitDAO in adopting the off-chain voting platform Snapshot.

item.title: Distributed ledger tech could save TradFi $100B a year: Lobby group
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: A new report from the Global Financial Markets Association says regulators need to take distributed ledger technology more seriously.

item.title: Celsius adds over 428K stETH to Lido’s lengthening withdrawal queue
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The bankrupt crypto lender wants its huge stash of staked Ether back, but it could be in for a wait.

item.title: Crypto retail trading should be regulated as gambling: UK lawmakers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: The volatility and purported lack of intrinsic value of most crypto assets make it particularly risky for consumers, the politicians claimed.

item.title: Lightning Labs launches rebranded ‘Taro’ amid Bitcoin’s BRC-20 bottleneck
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Lightning Labs has unveiled a new solution to the clunky process of minting new assets on the Bitcoin network.

item.title: Airdrops are great, but be aware of the risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Christos Makridis
item.description: Airdrops can be a great way to engage communities, but they also come with risks — from Sybil attacks to potential regulatory liability.

item.title: Breaking: Court victory for Ripple as judge denies SEC motion to seal Hinman docs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: United States District Judge Analisa Torres made the order on May 16 in a win for Ripple.

item.title: Bancor DAO hit with class-action suit over impermanent loss protection promises
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The pioneering DAO allegedly offered “risk-free” products that cost American retail investors tens of millions of dollars in losses.

item.title: CoinShares posts highest quarterly earnings since Q1 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Crypto investment firm CoinShares posted its most profitable quarter in a year, according to its latest quarterly earnings report.

item.title: 3 reasons why Ethereum price could struggle at the $1.9K level
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The ETH price could come under short-term pressure due to a downtrend in deposits, reduced DEX volume market share and futures data showing traders with a bearish bias.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman testifies in ‘historic’ Senate hearing on AI safety
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Altman appeared alongside NYU professor Gary Marcus and IBM chief of trust Christina Montgomery to discuss how the U.S. government should regulate the AI industry.

item.title: Can you recover stolen Bitcoin from crypto scams?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Recovering stolen Bitcoin from crypto scams is challenging due to the anonymous nature of blockchain transactions and jurisdictional issues.

item.title: Crypto community reacts to Ledger wallet’s secret recovery phrase service
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Many members of the crypto community believe Ledger’s latest seed phrase recovery feature is a bad idea.

item.title: Updated European tax directive requires reporting on all crypto asset transfers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: DAC8 extends tax reporting procedures to crypto transfers in line with the OECD crypto reporting framework and EU AML rules.

item.title: How blockchain is revolutionizing the gaming industry?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Emi Lacapra
item.description: GameFi is the new gaming frontier, providing an innovative model using blockchain and DeFi. Here’s all you need to know about blockchain-based games.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: The crypto market is down today as investor fear over a regulatory crackdown on the sector remains and the fight over raising the debt ceiling carries on.

item.title: ‘Trusted’ marketplace sold fake Trezor wallets stealing crypto: Kaspersky
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Cryptocurrency users are once again reminded about the importance of using only authentic hardware wallets.

item.title: 3 reasons why Lido DAO price jumped 40% in a week — Outperforming Bitcoin, Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: LDO’s price is well-positioned to gain another 50% by June based on a classic bullish reversal setup after Lido DAO rebounds 40%.

item.title: 9 Lessons DeFi Companies Would Be Wise To Learn From CeFi Companies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: While DeFi may be the wave of the future, the industry can still learn smart practices from leading CeFi companies.

item.title: Bitcoin Lightning company River raises $35M amid ‘new wave of institutional adoption’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: “We’re seeing another wave of Bitcoin interest, largely driven by business and institutional adoption,” says Alex Leishman, River CEO. “It’s not fueled by hype.”

item.title: The role of central limit order book DEXs in decentralized finance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: A look at the role of central limit order book DEXs in DeFi.

item.title: Ordinals turned Bitcoin into a worse version of Ethereum: Can we fix it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: Deluged by NFTs and memecoins, Bitcoin has suddenly become a worse version of Ethereum. There are conflicting ideas about how to fix it.

item.title: Libra-related Sui blockchain fixes critical bug that put ‘billions’ at risk
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The vulnerability was located in a file that translates human-readable code into machine language for storage.

item.title: Crypto community responds to US democrats backing SEC’s crypto authority
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: One community member expressed their decision to part ways with the party, arguing that the Democratic Party is playing god with the “future of American innovation.“

item.title: Bitcoin trader eyes CME gap with $24K BTC price dip target in play
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin may be in line for a final trip lower before recovery, analysis forecasts, with BTC price still lacking direction.

item.title: BlockFi used customer money to buy $30M insurance, creditors claim
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: BlockFi said selling its cryptocurrency lending platform might not generate value for creditors.

item.title: EU finance ministers approve MiCA crypto regulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: European Union finance ministers vote unanimously to adopt the bloc’s Markets in Crypto-Assets regulation.

item.title: Crypto bank runs in 2022 catalyzed by institutional withdrawals: Research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Research suggests the lack of insurance for depositors on crypto platforms induced fear among retail and institutional clients, leading to heavy withdrawals and a liquidity crunch.

item.title: Bitcoin Cash enables CashTokens upgrade on its network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Bitcoin Cash developer Jason Dreyzehner states that the latest upgrade incorporates support for CashTokens, which he considers a “tool for expanding financial access.”

item.title: Signature Bank failed to understand risks associated with crypto: FDIC chair
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: A related report by the FDIC chief risk officer cited poor management as “the root cause of Signature Bank’s failure.”
